pages.text: If you crush nether quartz in a $(l:arcana/mortar_and_pestle)mortar and pestle$(/l), you can create a base for a crystal. Combined with some water and $(l:arcana/arcanum_minerale)arcanum minerale$(/l), you can create your first crystal. However, it won't have much potential yet.
Your $(l:arcana/mortar_and_pestle)mortar and pestle$(/l) you crafted earlier will be retained after crushing, so you can re-use it.
